import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { GlobalState } from '../../../GlobalState' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Filters() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [categories] = state.categoriesAPI.categories const [category, setCategory] = state.productsAPI.category const [sort, setSort] = state.productsAPI.sort const [search, setSearch] = state.productsAPI.search const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const handleCategory = e => { setCategory(e.target.value) setSearch('') } const adminRouter = () => { return ( <>
